abstract: English gardener Charlie McCormick has brought passion for flower arranging and romantic touch to garden at Littlebredy house in Dorset.
lead_paragraph: In Dorset, Charlie McCormick has created an embroidered tapestry of blooms that lasts well into fall.

headline.main: An English Garden for All Seasons

snippet: In Dorset, Charlie McCormick has created an embroidered tapestry of blooms that lasts well into fall.
